sentences.en: As the baby suckles, a further supply of milk is generated.
sentences.cn: 婴儿吮吸时，会有更多的奶水流出来。

sentences.en: Clare is the baby of the family.
sentences.cn: 克莱尔是家里最小的孩子。

sentences.en: Cook the baby potatoes in their skins.
sentences.cn: 把这些小土豆连皮煮。

sentences.en: Don’t be a baby!
sentences.cn: 别像个三岁孩子似的！

sentences.en: He thought of the baby almost as an inanimate object.
sentences.cn: 他认为婴儿几乎就是毫无生命的物体。

sentences.en: I knew absolutely nothing about handling or feeding a baby.
sentences.cn: 我对如何抱婴儿、如何给婴儿喂食一无所知。

sentences.en: If a baby is thirsty, it feeds more often.
sentences.cn: 婴儿要是渴了，就会吃得更频繁。

sentences.en: In the end, it was an easy delivery: a fine baby boy.
sentences.cn: 分娩过程最终非常顺利，生了个健康的男婴。

sentences.en: Isabel was expecting their baby in the New Year.
sentences.cn: 伊莎贝尔年初要生孩子。

sentences.en: Maria was talking baby talk to the little one.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚正用儿语和小家伙说话。

sentences.en: She gave birth to a baby on Thursday.
sentences.cn: 她于星期四产下一名婴儿。

sentences.en: Smear Vaseline on to your baby's skin to prevent soreness.
sentences.cn: 给孩子皮肤上抹些凡士林以防止肿痛。

sentences.en: Swaddle your newborn baby so that she feels secure.
sentences.cn: 把你刚出生的孩子用襁褓包裹住，这样她会有安全感。

sentences.en: The baby has done a wee in his potty.
sentences.cn: 婴儿往便壶里撒了尿。

sentences.en: The baby is crying.
sentences.cn: 宝宝在哭。

sentences.en: The baby lay on his back with his eyes closed tight.
sentences.cn: 那个婴儿仰面躺着，两眼紧闭。

sentences.en: The baby was filled with alarm at the darkness and the noise.
sentences.cn: 在黑暗和嘈杂的声音中，婴儿饱受惊吓。

sentences.en: The signboard outside the factory read "baby milk plant".
sentences.cn: 工厂外的招牌上写着“婴儿乳品厂”。

sentences.en: What do you think of your new baby sister?
sentences.cn: 你觉得你刚出生的妹妹怎么样？

sentences.en: Who brings up the baby and who brings home the bacon?
sentences.cn: 是谁抚养孩子的，是谁赚钱养家的？

sentences.en: You'll never love anyone the way you love your baby.
sentences.cn: 你决不会像疼爱自己的孩子一样疼爱别人。

words.tran_cn: 幼稚的；愚蠢的；适于婴儿的
婴儿，小孩；女孩；天真幼稚的人
纵容，娇纵；把……当婴儿般对待

phrases.tran_cn: 童车；婴儿背带；轻型航空母舰
婴幼儿配方奶粉；婴幼儿配方
宝宝派对（在孩子出生前举办的特殊派对）
临时替人看小孩者；照顾婴孩者
宝宝总动员（一款韩国街机游戏）；来吧宝贝儿

phrases.phrase: throw the baby out (或 away) with the bathwater
phrases.tran_cn: 把洗澡水连同孩子一起倒掉，丢弃糟粕精华也扔了

trans.tran_en: Baby vegetables are vegetables picked when they are very small

trans.tran_cn: 婴儿，幼崽，最年幼的成员，幼稚的人，宝贝儿
trans.tran_en: a very young child who has not yet learned to speak or walk
to be too kind to someone and look after them as if they were a baby
